mapper.select: select u.courseCode,c.cousreName,unit1,unit2,unit3,unit4,unit5,unit6,unit7,unit8,unit9,unit10 from unit u inner join course c on u.courseCode = c.courseCode where u.courseCode=#{courseCode}
SELECT c.courseCode, c.cousreName FROM course c LEFT JOIN unit u ON c.courseCode = u.courseCode WHERE u.courseCode IS NULL
mapper.insert: insert into UNIT(courseCode, UNIT1, UNIT2, UNIT3,UNIT4,UNIT5,UNIT6,UNIT7,UNIT8,UNIT9,UNIT10) values(#{courseCode}, #{unit1},#{unit2},#{unit3},#{unit4},#{unit5},#{unit6},#{unit7},#{unit8},#{unit9},#{unit10})
